GSP29snyayvpu:672: [NAV_2] tathānye: “'syedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃyogi samavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam” iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:673: tathā: “pūrvavac cheṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭam” ityādi -- tad bālapralapitaprāyam ity avagantavyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:688: vṛkṣāc chāyām ityādi pakṣadharmatvavirahe 'py anumimīmahe. kālādikas tatra dharmī samasty eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:689: tatra pakṣadharmatā liṅgasya gṛhyata iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:691: evaṃ hi śabdasyānityatve sādhye kākakārṣṇyāder api gamakatvaprasaktes,
GSP29snyayvpu:692: tatrāpi lokāder dharmiṇaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyatvāt. tathānvayavikalo 'py anityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:693: śrāvaṇatvād ity ayaṃ samyagghetutayā samarthayituṃ śakya iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:695: tāvakākūtenāiva sakalaṃ sattvam anityatayā kroḍīkṛtam iti bhāvadharmaḥ śrāvaṇatvaṃ katham anityatāṃ vihāya vipakṣe vartitum utsaheta,
GSP29snyayvpu:700: ghaṭādivad ity ayam api gamako vyākhyātaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:703: [NAV_5.3] tathā kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhirūpaliṅgatrayaniyamo 'pi kila tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇasambandhāstitvam eteṣv eveti yaḥ kriyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:705: prakṛtasambandhadvayavikalasyāpi rūpāde rasādigamakatvadarśanāt. mā bhūt tasya tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ gamakatvaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:707: tathāpi nānyathānupapannatvam eva hetor lakṣaṇam iti yadi vaiśeṣiko manyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:708: so 'nyathā nirloṭhanīyaḥ. sa hi vikalpataḥ paryanuyojyaḥ:
GSP29snyayvpu:709: samavāyibhyaḥ samavāyo 'bhinno bhinno vā. yady abhinnaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:722_0: svāṃśavartane 'pi sāmastyāikadeśacodyāvatārāc ca. tatrāpi sāmastyapakṣe bahutvaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:722_1: tadavastham eva. ekadeśapakṣe tv aṃśāntaraprasaṅgenānavasthā. tan na samavāyabalāt
GSP29snyayvpu:723: tasyāiva tatra duḥsthitatvāt. etena saṃyogino 'pi gamakatā pratyuktā,
GSP29snyayvpu:724: samānadūṣaṇatvāt. virodhino 'pi viruddhābhāvagamakatvam anyathānupapannatvam eva sūcayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:726: [NAV_5.4] evaṃ paraparikalpitam anyad api liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ yad gamakatāṅgaṃ tad anyathānupapannatvaṃ na vyabhicarati,
GSP29snyayvpu:730: [NAV_5.5] tad evam anumānalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyādhunā yac chauddhodaniśiṣyakair nyagādi,
GSP29snyayvpu:735: atasmiṃs tadgrahaṇasya ca bhrāntilakṣaṇatvāt. prāmāṇyaṃ punaḥ praṇālikayā bahiḥ svalakṣaṇabalāyātatvād anumānasya. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:740: arthāvyabhicāritvād bhrāntam api pramāṇam iti saṅgīryate; tad uktam:
GSP29snyayvpu:741: “atasmiṃs tadgraho bhrāntir api sambandhataḥ prameti” -- tad apākartum āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:745: aviparītārthagrāhīti yāvat. iyaṃ ca pratijñā. pramīyate yathāvasthito 'rthaḥ paricchidyate 'neneti pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:746: tadbhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt. ayaṃ tu hetuḥ. saṅgatam akṣāṇām iti samakṣaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:747: tad iva samakṣavad iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ. tad idam anumānasya bhrāntatānirākārakaṃ sampūrṇāvayavam,
GSP29snyayvpu:752: iha yad yat pramāṇaṃ tat tad abhrāntaṃ yathā samakṣaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:754: tasmāt pramāṇatvād abhrāntam iti pratipadyantām iti. tatrārthavādī tāvat samakṣalakṣaṇe dṛṣṭānte sādhyavikalatām āvirbhāvayituṃ na pārayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:755: svayam eva samakṣasyābhrāntatayā 'bhyupagamāt. śūnyavādinaḥ punaḥ samastāpalāpitvāt pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraṃ praty ayogyatāiveti na tam adhikṛtya svasādhanadoṣāḥ parihartavyāḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:758: yady asti tarhi pratijñāhāniḥ. atha nāsti,
GSP29snyayvpu:762_2: grāhyagrāhakākārakaluṣitaṃ bahiṣprathamānaṃ nikhilam api jñānaṃ viparyastatayā pratijānānaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:765: bhrāntaṃ pramāṇam ity etad viruddhaṃ vacanaṃ yataḥ // NA_6 //
GSP29snyayvpu:767: yad uta na kevalam anumānaṃ bhrāntaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:768: kiṃ tarhi yad bhavadbhir dṛṣṭāntatayopāttaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad api bhrāntam eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:770: tad etan na. kuta ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:773: [NAV_6.2] nanu ca pramāṇatām abhrāntatānyathānupapannāṃ yadi paraḥ pratipadyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:774: tatas tām abhyupagacchan kathaṃ bhrāntatāvipratipattiṃ vidadhyād iti pārśvasthitavacanāvakāśam āśaṅkya,
GSP29snyayvpu:775: bhrāntatāpramāṇatayor virodhasādhanena tataḥ pramāṇatāṃ vyāvartyānanyaśaraṇatayā pratijñātābhrāntatākrāntāṃ tāṃ darśayann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:776: bhrāntam ityādi. bhrāntaṃ viparyastam atha ca pramāṇaṃ grāhyaparicchedahetur ity etad vacanam evaṃviddhārthapratyāyako dhvanir viruddhaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:779: tathā hy: aviditaparamārthavyāvahārikābhiprāyeṇa lokasaṃvṛtiṃ ghaṭayanto vayaṃ dṛḍhataravāsanāprabodhasampāditasattākayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoḥ pramāṇatām ācakṣmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:780: tadabhiprāyeṇa darśitārthaprāpakatvena tayor avisaṃvādakatvāt. śithilavāsanāunmukhyanirmitajanmakayoḥ punar apramāṇatāṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:782: bhrāntatāṃ punas tattvacintakābhiprāyeṇa sakalasya bahir upaplavamānasya grāhyagrāhakākārakāluṣyadūṣitasya pratibhāsasya pāramārthikādvayasaṃvedanaviparyastarūpatvād abhidadhmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:785: gatyantarābhāvāt. na tāvad avayavirūpo vicāraṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:788: teṣv asāv ekadeśena vartate sāmastyena vā. na tāvad ekadeśena,
GSP29snyayvpu:789: tasya svayaṃ niravayavatvāt. avayavavṛttinimittam aṃśāntarakalpane tadvṛttāv apy aṃśāntarakalpanaprasaṅgas,
GSP29snyayvpu:793: na: tatrāpy avayavamātram avayavimātraṃ vā syād,
GSP29snyayvpu:796: samastāvayavavyāpino 'vayavino 'bhyupagame paṭāder ekadeśarāgakampadarśanādiṣu sakalarāgakampadarśanādīni durnivārāṇi syur,
GSP29snyayvpu:797_0: ekasya rāgārāgādiviruddhadharmādhyāsāyogād iti. nāpy avayavarūpo 'rtho vicāragocaracārī
GSP29snyayvpu:806: [NAV_6.4] atra pratividhīyate -- yad avādi saṃvedanam advayaṃ pāramārthikaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:810: bahir antaś cānekākāratayā harṣaviṣādādibhiḥ sthirasthūratādyanekadharmaparikaritārthagrahaṇapariṇāmaiś ca vivartamānaṃ saṃvedanam upalabhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:811: na punar vedyavedakākāraviviktaṃ yādṛg bhavadbhir upavarṇyate jñānaṃ tādṛśaṃ kasyacit kadācana pratītigocaracāritām anubhavaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:812: advayapratibhāsasya svapnadaśāyām apy ananubhūteḥ. na ca tattvacintakā api pramāṇam antareṇa svākūtaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantaḥ prekṣāvatām avadheyavacanā bhavanty,
GSP29snyayvpu:813_0: anyathāikam acetanam avyayam api brahmānekaṃ cetanaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅguratākrāntam avidyātaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:813_1: prathata iti bruvāṇo 'nirākāryaḥ syāt. yad api bahirarthanirākaraṇadhiyā avayavyavayavadvāreṇa dūṣaṇam adāyi,
GSP29snyayvpu:815: pratyakṣapratibhāsāpahnave tanmūlakatvāt kuyuktivikalpānām utthānābhāvāt. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:816_1: samānam eveti na dūṣaṇam. anekākāravivartasyālīkatvān na tena saha saṃvedanasya pāramārthikasya
GSP29snyayvpu:817: nanv evam itaretarāśrayaṃ duruttaram āḍhaukate. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:819: tatsiddhau ca tadalīkatvam iti nyāyāt. anyac cādvayam apy ekakṣaṇavarti saṃvedanaṃ yathā pūrvottarakṣaṇābhyāṃ sambandham anubhavati,
GSP29snyayvpu:820_0: tathā niraṃśā api yadi paramāṇavo digaṃśaiḥ paramāṇvantarair vā saṃśleṣamāgaccheyuḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:820_1: kim ayuktaṃ syāt. na cāvayavyavayavayor ekāntavyatirekāvyatirekapakṣe yad dūṣaṇaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:822: bahir antaś ca tathāiva prakāśamānatayā tayor nihnotum aśakyatvāt. etena rāgārāgakampākampādivirodhodbhāvanam api prativyūḍhaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:827: bhinnapravṛttinimittatvāc ca sarvadharmānāṃ tadviparyayasampādyo virodho dūrāpāsta eva. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:828_1: abhyupayato bahirarthe viruddhadharmādhyāsapratiṣedhabuddhiḥ kevalaṃ jāḍyaṃ sūcayati.
GSP29snyayvpu:828_2: tan na pramāṇaṃ kathañcid bhrāntaṃ samasti,
GSP29snyayvpu:832: na ca tadudayasamaye kasyacid idam alīkārtham idaṃ tv analīkārtham iti vivekenāvadhāraṇaṃ samasti,
GSP29snyayvpu:833: bhrāntābhrāntābhimatayos tadekarūpatayā prakāśanāt. yadā ca viśadadarśanapathacāriṇo 'pi śaśadharayugalādayo 'līkatām āviśanto dṛśyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:834: tadā sakalasatyārthatābhimatapratibhāseṣv apy alīkārthatāśaṅkānivṛtter anāśvāsa eva. na ca tadarthaprāptyādikam ārekānirākaraṇakāraṇaṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:835: svapnāvasthāyāṃ tatsadbhāve 'py alīkārthatāsiddheḥ. bādhakapratyayopanipātāt tasyāsatyārthateti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:837_0: tasya svagocaraparyavasitatvena bādhakatvāyogāt. anyathā nīlam ādadānā devadattabuddhiḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:847: anyathā tadbhrāntatāyogāt. evaṃ ca tajjātīyam anyad apy abhrāntaṃ syāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:848_0: tataś ca sakalapratibhāsasya samastasaṃvedanasya bhrāntatvāsiddhito viparyastatvāniṣpatter
GSP29snyayvpu:848_1: yat sphuṭaṃ svānyaniścāyi suniścitatayā svaparaprakāśakaṃ tat pramāṇam iti sambandhaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:848_2: tac ca dvayasiddhau svarūpārthalakṣaṇayugmaniṣpattau prasiddhyati niṣpadyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:849: anyathā prameyābhāve pramāṇābhāvāt. tasmāt pramāṇam urarīkurvāṇenārtho 'py abhyupagantavya ity abhiprāya iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:851: [NAV_8.0] tad evaṃ svārthānumānalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādya tadvatāṃ bhrāntatāvipratipattiṃ ca nirākṛtyādhunāpratipāditaparārthānumānalakṣaṇa evālpavaktavyatvāt tāvac chābdalakṣaṇam āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:856: vidheyatvāt. dṛṣṭena pramāṇāvalokiteneṣṭaḥ pratipādayiṣito 'vyāhato 'nirākṛtaḥ sāmarthyād artho yasmin vākye tattathā,
GSP29snyayvpu:858: tasmāt. paramo 'kṛtrimaḥ puruṣopayogī śakyānuṣṭhāno vārtho vācyas,
GSP29snyayvpu:859: tam abhidhātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tat paramārthābhidhāyi,
GSP29snyayvpu:860_0: viśiṣṭārthadarśakam ity arthaḥ. tatas tattvagrāhitayotpannaṃ prakṛtavākyapratipādyārthādānaśīlatayā
GSP29snyayvpu:860_1: labdhātmasattākaṃ yan mānaṃ tac śābdam iti prakīrtitam upavarṇitaṃ pūrvācāryair iti
GSP29snyayvpu:860_2: sambandhaḥ. tatra dṛṣṭeṣṭāvyāhatād ity anena kutīrthikavacasāṃ laukikavipratārakoktīnāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:861_0: pramāṇabādhitatvāt. vākyād ity amunā tu vākyasyāiva niyatārthadarśakatvāt paramārthābhidhāyiteti
GSP29snyayvpu:861_1: darśayan padāc chābdābhāvam āha. paramārthābhidhāyina ity anena jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkāropadeśādivacanaprabhavajñānasya
GSP29snyayvpu:861_2: niṣphalatayā prāmāṇyaṃ nirācaṣṭe. tattvagrāhitayotpannam ity amunā tv evaṃbhūtād
GSP29snyayvpu:861_3: api vākyāc chrotṛdoṣād viparītādyarthagrahaṇacaturatayā prādurbhūtasya śābdatvaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:861_4: vārayati. mānam ity anenāntarbhāvitapropasargārthena śābde parasyāprāmāṇyabuddhiṃ tiraskurute,
GSP29snyayvpu:865: nāpramāṇasya sūcakatvāyogāt. nanu ca hetupratipādane yadi tat pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:870: taddarśite 'rthe vikalpapratīkṣaṇāt tasyāiva prāmāṇyam āsajyeta. tadgṛhītam evārtham asāv abhilāpayatīti cec chabdapratipāditaṃ hetuṃ pramāṇāntaraṃ samarthayata iti samāno nyāyaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:873: laukikaṃ śāstrajaṃ ceti. tatredam dvayor api sādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditaṃ. samarthanaṃ punar avipratārakavacanaprabhavasyehādivākyaprastāva eva laukikasya vihitaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:874: śāstrajasya tu vidhātavyam iti yādṛśaḥ śāstrāt tajjātaṃ pramāṇatām anubhavati tad darśayati:
GSP29snyayvpu:878: śiṣyate 'neneti vā śāstram. tat kiṃbhūtam iti tadviśeṣaṇāny āha. āptaḥ prakṣīṇāśeṣarāgādidoṣagaṇas,
GSP29snyayvpu:884: tasya rāgādikaluṣitatvena vitathārthakathanapravṛtteḥ. tadanuṣṭhānād api svakāryasiddhau praṇayanārtham api puruṣaḥ kiṃ neṣyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:885: viśeṣābhāvāt. tan na kṣīṇadoṣavacanaṃ vyatiricyānyataḥ prekṣāvatāṃ paralokādāv adṛṣṭe 'rthe pravṛttir yuktā;
GSP29snyayvpu:888: [NAV_9.2] ata evollaṅghyate prābalyena gamyate 'bhibhūyate anyair ity ullaṅghyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:890: sarvavacanātiśāyīti yāvat. ata eva dṛṣṭena pramāṇanirṇīteneṣṭasya tadvācyasya virodho yasmiṃs tattathā tad eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:897: [NAV_9.3] tadiyatā śāstrasya svārthasampad uktā. adhunā tattvopadeśādīnāṃ parārthatvāt parārthasampadam āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:900: teṣāṃ upadeśaḥ svarūpaprakāśanaṃ tadrakṣaṇādividhānaṃ vā. taṃ karoti tattvopadeśakṛt. ata eva sārvaṃ sarvasmai hitaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:905: sarvajanāpakārikumatavidhvaṃsakam ity arthaḥ. īdṛśād eva śāstrāj jātaṃ śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:910: tac ca pratyakṣe 'pi paśyann ekayogakṣematvāt sāmānyenāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:912: parārthaṃ mānam ākhyātaṃ vākyaṃ tadupacārataḥ // NA_10 //
GSP29snyayvpu:914: svaniścayavad ityādi lakṣaṇam. sva ātmā tasya niścayaḥ prameyādhigamas,
GSP29snyayvpu:916: yathātmano 'rthanirṇayas tathā pareṣāṃ nirṇayajananam ity arthaḥ. budhair vidvadbhiḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:917: parasmai arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yena tat parārthaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:921: tathā jñānam api parapratyāyanāya vyāpriyamānaṃ parārthaṃ prāpnotīty āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:927: svaparopakāritvāc ca. kathaṃ vacanam ajñānarūpaṃ pramāṇam ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:931: pratipādyagatam utpatsyamānaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tad avyavahitakāraṇatvād vacanam apy upacāreṇa pramāṇam ity ucyate. tatrānumānasya pārārthyaṃ parair abhyupagatam eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:933: kiledaṃ śabdapraveśaśūnyasvalakṣaṇagrāhīti nāitadgocaraḥ parebhyaḥ pratipādayituṃ pāryate. na ca śabdāt parasya svalakṣaṇagrahaṇadakṣaṃ pratyakṣam unmaṅkṣyati,
GSP29snyayvpu:934: śabdasya vikalpotpāditatvena parasyāpi vikalpotpādakatvāt. tad uktaṃ:
GSP29snyayvpu:936: kāryakāraṇatā teṣāṃ nārthaṃ śabdāḥ spṛśanty api” //
GSP29snyayvpu:939: ato na śabdajanyam ity ato 'numānaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya pratyakṣasyāpi parārthatāṃ sādhayitum āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:941: parasya tadupāyatvāt parārthatvaṃ dvayor api // NA_11 //
GSP29snyayvpu:942: [NAV_11.1] pratyakṣeṇāpy anumāneneva prasiddhārthaprakāśanāt svapratītaprameyapratyāyakatvāt parārthatvaṃ pratipādyaprayojanatvaṃ dvayor api pratyakṣānumānayos,
GSP29snyayvpu:944: nānumānasyāivāikasyety abhiprāyaḥ. iha cāśrūyamāṇatvāt tadarthagamanāc cāpīvaśabdau luptanirdiṣṭau draṣṭavyau. pratyakṣapratītārthapratyāyanaṃ ca pratijānānasyāyam abhiprāyo:
GSP29snyayvpu:945: yat paro manyate -- nāitadgocaraṃ parebhyaḥ pratipādayituṃ pāryata iti -- tad ayuktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:946: nirvikalpakādhyakṣāpohena vyavasāyarūpasya pratyakṣasya prāg eva sādhitatvāt,

GSP29snyayvpu:2487_1: 'pi yādṛśaḥ prāgavasthāyāṃ tādṛśa eva santiṣṭhamānaḥ prāg apramātā paścāt pramāteti
GSP29snyayvpu:2489: [NAV_31.10] paścārddhena punar bhūtavyatirekiṇaṃ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣanirgrāhyaṃ jīvaṃ darśayaṃś cārvākadarśanaṃ tiraskurute,
GSP29snyayvpu:2490: jaḍātmakabhūtāvyatireke hi tadvilakṣaṇabodharūpaharṣaviṣādādivivartānubhavābhāvaprasaṅgāt. nanu ca kāyākārapariṇatāni bhūtāny evātmavyatirekiṇīṃ cetanām utkālayanti;
GSP29snyayvpu:2492: tadabhāve punas teṣv eva nilīyata iti;
GSP29snyayvpu:2495: dvayaṃ hi tāvad etat saṃyogam anubhavad upalababhyate -- paṭcabhūtātmakaṃ śarīraṃ cetanā ca. tatrāpi śarīraṃ bahirmukhākāreṇa bodhenārtharūpatayā jaḍam anubhūyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2497: 'ta evāvyatirekapakṣaḥ pratibhāsanirākṛtatvān nāśaṅkitaḥ. vyatirekiṇoḥ punaḥ prakāśamānayor yadi bhūtāny eva cetanām utkālayantīti bhavadbhiḥ parikalpyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2498: tadā cetanāiva bhavāntarād utpattisthānamāyātā paṭcabhūtabhrāntijanakaṃ śarīraṃ nirvartayet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2501: tadviyuktaṃ punaḥ kāṣṭhavat tiṣṭhed iti jīvasampādyam eva śarīraṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2504: jīvasya cetanāvataḥ sakarmakatayāparāparabhavabhramaṇāparāparaśarīranirvartanayor upapadyamānatvāt. bhavāntarād āgacchan utpattisthānaṃ jīvo 'dhyakṣeṇa nopalabhyata iti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:2505: bhūtāny api tarhi kāyākāradhāraṇadvāreṇa cetanām utkālayantīti pratyakṣeṇa nopalakṣyanta iti samāno nyāhaḥ. atha kāyākārapariṇateṣv eva bhūteṣu cetanopalabhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2507: evaṃ tarhi mṛtāvasthāyāṃ kāyākāram ābibhrāṇeṣv api nopalabdhā,
GSP29snyayvpu:2508: kāyākārapariṇāmo vā kādācitkatayā hetvantarāpekṣītyanyathānupapattivaśād eva tannirvartanakṣamā cetanā bhavāntarāgatajīvasambandhinīti pratipadyāmahe. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:2509: jīvas tāvat karmacaitanyasambandhāc charīranirvartanārthaṃ pravarata iti yuktam evāitad,
GSP29snyayvpu:2514: tac caitanyaṃ tebhyo bhinnam abhinnam vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2516: tadā puruṣaśarīravat tatrāpi bhūtaiḥ saha vartamānam api bhūtavilakṣaṇam ātmakāraṇam anumāpayatīti tadavasthāiva jīvasiddhiḥ. athābhinnaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2519: tatsvarūpavat. nijanijacaitanyāvyatirekīṇi bhūtāni tenāyam adoṣa iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2521: tatsampādyapuruṣaśarīre 'pi tajjanyapañcacaitanyaprasaṅgāt. pañcāpi sambhūya bṛhatpuruṣacaitanyaṃ bahavas tilā iva tailaghaṭaṃ janayantīti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2522: tat tarhi puruṣacaitanyaṃ kiṃ teṣām eva saṃyogo yad vā tadutpādyam, anyad eva?
GSP29snyayvpu:2526: itarathā bahupuruṣacaitanyāni sambhūya bṛhattamacaitanyāntaram ārabheran. atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣas,
GSP29snyayvpu:2527: tatrāpi teṣāṃ kim anvayo 'sti nāsti vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2531: niranvayotpādasya pramāṇabādhitatvāt. tan na sacetanāni bhūtāni cetanākaraṇe vyāpārabhāñji bhavitum arhanti. nāpi niścetanāni,
GSP29snyayvpu:2533: itarathā sikatādayas tailādikaraṇe vyāpriyeran. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:2534: tatsamudāyamātrasādhyaṃ vā caitanyaṃ syād viśiṣṭatatpariṇāmasādhyaṃ vā. na tāvad ādyā kḷptir,
GSP29snyayvpu:2535: ilājalānalānilanabhastalamīlane 'pi cetanānupalabdheḥ. dvitīyavikḷptau punaḥ kiṃ tad vaiśiṣṭyam iti vācyam. kāyākārapariṇāma iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2536: sa tarhi sarvadā kasmān na bhavati?
GSP29snyayvpu:2538: tat tarhi hetvantaraṃ bhavāntarāyātajīvacaitanyam ity anumimīmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2542: api tu sa eva tajjanya iti yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. na pratyakṣād anyat pramāṇam asti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2544: tena dṛṣṭāny eva bhūtāni tatkāraṇatayā kalpanīyānīti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2547: tathā ca bhūyāṃsy anumānāni paralokānuyāyijīvasādhakāni pravarteran. tad yathā -- tadaharjātabālakasyādyastanābhilāṣaḥ pūrvābhilāṣapūrvako,
GSP29snyayvpu:2550: tad idam anumānam ādyastanābhilāṣasyābhilāṣāntarapūrvakatvam anumāpayad arthāpattyā paralokayāyijīvamākṣipati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2551: tajjanmany abhilāṣāntarābhāvāt. evam anyad apy udāhāryam ity āstāṃ tāvat.

GSP29snyayvpu:2560: seyam anantaroktasthityā prakīrtiteti saṃsargaḥ. kiṃbhūtety āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:2563: na vidyete ādinidhane yasyāsau tathāvidha ātmā svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ sānādinidhanātmikā;
